item.title: 3 Nice Garage Records
item.description: No particular order, just three Garage records I think are great. Enjoy! 1. Pied Piper & Unknown MC - Listen 2. Digga - Da Lick 3. Butter - Do Me Right

item.title: CV
item.description: Education 2016-2020 (Current) MSci, Physics (Credit Weighted Mean: 77% ); University of Bristol Interested in Mathematical and Theoretical Physics,Particle Physics, and Machine Learning. MSci project entitiled ‘Deep Learning for Event Classification at the LUX=-ZEPLIN Experiment’ 2009-2016 A-Level, GCSE; Lancaster Royal Grammar School A* in A-level Maths, Further Maths and Physics, A in AS-level Chemistry. 10 GCSEs with 6 A* grades, 2 A grades, and 2 B grades.
